section.title: Introduction
section.para: The purpose of this document is to describe how to enable @gold_edition@.

section.title: @gold_edition@
section.para:
@gold_edition@ is a comprehensive platform designed to deliver solutions for workforce mobility, BYO initiatives, desktop virtual projects and more. It comprises advanced features such as an SSL VPN and two factor authentication support for enhanced security and integration to Microsoft SharePoint and Alfresco. It delivers seamless applications and desktop sessions from Windows and Linux servers to native Windows and Linux clients, HTML5 enabled browsers and mobile devices. A fully featured administrator web console provides for configuration of server settings, user management, application publishing and server monitoring along with server load balancing for optimum performance and scalability.
OVD Premium Modules
The @gold_edition@ allows to enable premium features such as SmartCard feature and allows communication between the OVD Session Manager and OVD Premium Modules such as
Native Client
Gateway SSL
iOS client
Android client
